data.title: English 1201 Short Story 5 The-Soul-Of-Caliban
data.meta_description: english_1201_short_story_5_the-soul-of-caliban.doc - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides instructions for a short story assignment. Students are asked to read and analyze the short story "The Soul of Caliban" by Emma Lindsay Squier. The analysis includes defining vocabulary words, discussing how the author develops the character of Caliban, whether the story supports the idea that animals have souls, identifying the conflict and decision faced by a character, determining the climax, and discussing the resolution.
